articles.author: MENG YEW CHOONG
articles.title: Pan-Asian Railway closer to realisation - The Star Online
articles.description: After 18 countries signed the Trans-Asian Railway Network Agreement in June 2006, the Kunming-Vientiane rail journey will be possible next month, which makes analysts wonder whether Malaysia is up to speed compared with its neighbours when it comes to rail ne…

articles.title: I visited the new Pop-Up Disney! exhibition and it's no Disneyland, but it's a good alternative - AsiaOne
articles.description: While we've got Universal Studios here in Singapore, it's no Disneyland — at least in the eyes of diehard Disney fans. With the nearest parks located in Hong Kong and Shanghai, and international travel not exactly the best option right now, your best option t…
